product_name: SunCloud Sequin Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The SunCloud Sequin Polarized Sunglasses for women feature a classic shape and summery style while providing full coverage from the glaring rays of the sun. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact-resistant. The SunCloud Sequin Polarized Sunglasses best fit medium profiles. Closeout.
short_description: The SunCloud Sequin Polarized Sunglasses for women feature a classic shape and summery style while providing full coverage from the glaring rays of the sun.
